title: Data Mining and Data Warehouses

author: Dunja Mladenić, Artificial Intelligence Laboratory, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: Nikki Bocetos Covinsky conferences, data mining and data warehouses.
So this conference is organized since year 2000 at Information Society, and there are two of US market global look at myself organizing the con.
The theme of the conference is on automatic data analysis.
Where we are trying to obtain some interesting information from the existing data and also provide to users some new insights into data so you can see different conference teams that are covered.
And this is the program talks are available or they are going to be available at videolectures.net and the conference was held yesterday.
So if you were in there, please visit the website.

We had two invited talks both touching on the topic of social media, one on sustainability of social media design, engagement and business models and the other one on social media monitoring tools and services, which is actually a business and marketing report on the situation.
The contributing papers, three covering sentiment analysis, multilingual document retrieval and relation extraction from textual data.
For papers in the area of text, data mining and machine Learning Address Inc. Crawling and aggregating news search over news, clustering and learning event punctuality from text.
And for papers on data, my applications of data mining and machine learning, 1 automatic report generation, the other an information search.
The third one on complex event processing on photo aesthetics.
So I think the conference went very well yesterday.
So I the only thing I can do now if you missed it is to invite you to visit the website.
